English: The seed has been pierced by a chestnut.
The seed has been eaten by an insect.
The seed has drowned in the water.
The seed has been cut by a hoe.
中文: 种子被斧头砍成两半了。

English: The seed has been eaten by a bird.
The seed found a place next to the large tree. \nSoon the sprout will grow up and produce more and more seeds.
中文: 种子在一颗大树旁发现了一片土地，\n很快它就会长大生出更多种子。

English: \nIts death is not in vain, as it will grow into grass. Take advantage of that to make a journey throughout this world
中文: \n但这次死亡并不是毫无意义，它长出了叶子，可以利用它继续探索世界。

English: \nMore energy bursts from the seed. This time it's more than just grass.
中文: \n种子中迸发了能量，这次长出的不只是叶子。

English: \nThe golden flower will shine into every dark corner of the world.
中文: \n金黄的花朵会在整个世界绽放。

English: The seed has fertilized the ground. You can now explore underground.
中文: 种子会使土地肥沃，你可以探索地下世界了。

English: \nWith the limited amount of oxygen in this cave, the seed has grown into a fern.
中文: \n因为山洞中的氧气有限，种子长成了一株蕨类植物。

English: \nIts death is not in vain. The bird takes it to the cliff and drops it there, the seed starts growing into a vine on cliff.
\nIts death is not in vain, as it has grown into various lotus leaves.
中文: \n它的死亡不是毫无意义，它长出了一些莲叶。

English: \nIts death is not in vain, as it has grown into wheat and is now being farmed by humans.
中文: \n它的死亡不是毫无意义，它长出了一些小麦。

English: \nThe progress of spreading throughout the world has increased.
中文: \n种子散播到全世界的进程增加了！

English: \nThanks for playing. You may keep exploring the game.
中文: \n感谢玩我们的游戏，你可以继续探索这个世界。

English: Left or Right to select spawn point.\nSpace to respawn

中文: 这里的土地看起来有些贫瘠……

English: The seed can not sprout because it is too deep.
中文: 这里太深了，种子没办法在这里发芽。

English: The soil is fertilized and a root can now grow better... There might be more space to explore
中文: 土地被滋养了，可能产生了更多可以探索的空间。

English: The seed has now completed its journey, as it has spread throughout the world. Thanks for helping it!
中文: 种子完成了它的旅程，散播到了世界各地。谢谢你帮助它！

English: Do you want to watch ads to get a hint?
中文: 想要看广告得到提示么？

English: Do you want to watch ads to support us?
中文: 可以看一个广告来支持我们么？（第一次加载可能比较慢）

English:
Programmer: Flavedo
Artist: Sealcat
Composer and Sound Designer: Dieck
Audio Engine: FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd
中文:
程序: Flavedo
美术: Sealcat
音乐音效: Dieck
声音引擎: FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd

English: Do you want to clear your previous data and restart the game?
中文: 是否想要清空之前的进度重新开始？
在地下死亡过以后右转找到我

English: Find me on the left of the river
Find me jumping from the highest of the tree
中文: 在树的最高点跳下来找到我

English: The seed wants to spread throughout the world. Help it reach its goal.
中文: 这颗种子想要散播到世界各地，帮帮它吧！
这里的土地看起来有点贫瘠……

English: This is the end of the road
